Oh, thanks, it would be very appreciated :)

I want to have a switch with options "move" or "selection". 

If you click on "move", you can drag the map with left click

If you click on "selection", you can select your area with left click

Choosing the left click is OK with dragbutton, but selection of an area always requires a key entered in the same time.

So, I think enable/disable need to press the default button (or ability to choose a key -including "no button") for selection would be helpfull. Especially for the touch devices, but not only ;}
